Detailed Description

Hardware Dictionary class.

The Orca header includes the following construction: 

  <key>ObjectInfo</key>
  <dict>
          <key>Crates</key>
          <array>
                  <dict>
                          <key>Cards</key>
                          <array>
                                 <dict>
                                       <key>Card</key>
                                       <integer>0</integer>
                                       <key>Class Name</key> 
                                       <string>ORCardName</string>


  ...
This class takes this construction and inverts it. That is, it collects all the ORCardNames into one dictionary with card/crate keys. To get a particular dictionary, use GetDecoderDictionary().

bool ORHardwareDictionary::LoadHardwareDictFromDict ( const ORDictionary *  dict  )  [virtual]

Finds all the hardware in the plist under: the keywords crate (card), etc. In most cases, dict will be the header dictionary parsed from the Orca header.
